title: Structured House
description: Build a house where every piece is positioned with variables.

title: Sprouting Flower
description: Animate a flower growing from the ground.

title: Rainbow Ball
description: Animate a bouncing ball that leaves a colourful rainbow trail.

title: Caesar Cipher
description: Encrypt a secret message using an ancient Roman cipher.

title: Acronym
description: Build acronyms from phrases and titles.

title: Alien Detector
description: Track and destroy every last alien in Space Invaders.

title: Matching Socks
description: Find matching pairs of socks across two laundry baskets.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Build the full game logic for Tic Tac Toe.

title: Sieve of Eratosthenes
description: Find all the prime numbers using an ancient algorithm.

title: Emoji Collector
description: Navigate mazes collecting emojis and tallying up your haul.
